name: Shramik Bharti
briefDescription: Shramik Bharti is a grassroot development organization working with rural and urban disadvantaged communities in Kanpur, Kanpur Dehat, Auraiya, Sultanpur and Shravasti districts of Uttar Pradesh since 1986.  We are working on safe motherhood, eye care, water, sanitation & hygiene, sustainable agriculture, waste land development, rainwater harvesting, renewable energy, micro-finance, micro-insurance, equine welfare etc. Our programs are influencing lives of about 1 million people. In all our endeavours we are committed to empower the disadvantaged people to increase choices in their lives.
